title: Learning safety skills for community independence
description: Learning safety skills for community independence
content:
Scenario: Learning safety skills for community independence
    Given Jordan wants to navigate community more independently
    And safety education supports risk-taking and growth
    When Jordan takes community safety education
    Then the training covers real-world scenarios (crossing streets, stranger danger)
    And instruction uses visual supports and repeated practice
    And Jordan can demonstrate understanding in accessible ways
    And safety skills increase Jordan's independent community access
    And education balances safety with dignity and autonomy
    And Jordan's capability for safe independence grows through learning
